# `signOut()`

Use `nhost.auth.signOut` to sign out the user.

```ts
nhost.auth.signOut()
```

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">params</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> <code>{ all: boolean }</code>

---

## Examples

### Sign out the user from current device

```ts
nhost.auth.signOut()
```

### Sign out the user from all devices

```ts
nhost.auth.signOut({ all: true })
```
